item.description: Julio and Clint say, Join us in this fun, social, easy, and very profitable business plan. Julio Sanabia, a successful Organo Gold representative will show you how to "MAKE MONEY WITH YOUR NEW fRIENDS".  We have a proven business plan and the team to make profits happen. Welcome to an Evening of Organo Gold Coffee Tasting. Gourmet Mocha, Lattes, Black coffee, Organic Green Tea and more. Meet up with many great people and enjoy the sampling. Host an Organo Coffee Tasting at your home or business and see our proven plan for success. Join today, Meet Up with our fun group, and "MAKE MONEY WITH YOUR NEW FRIENDS".
item.how_to_find_us: See Clint, Julio, Jenn, Maria, Kessandra, Orlando, Jose, and many more members of our team.
item.name: "Friends"... See our Proven Business Plan that makes great profits every day.
